features.name: Rockfall
features.description: Save: DC 15 vs DEX, a 5 ft. radius sphere centered on a point within 30 ft. of you, all target. Hit: 7 (2d6) bludgeoning damage. Miss: half damage.

features.name: Ranged Attack
features.description: Ranged: +8 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 26 (4d10 + 4) piercing damage.

features.name: Stone Barrier
features.description: Utility: You create a 10 ft. radius circle centered on a point within 30 ft. of you. Effect Targets inside the area gain Three-Quarters Cover from any attacks from outside the area until the end of your next turn.
